channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟠 18:24 Attention! Dronov-Kamikadze attack, traffic to Novopavlivka
item.description: 🟠 18:24 Attention! Dronov-Kamikadze attack, traffic to Novopavlivka #m_nikopol_that_nikopol_ territorial This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🟡 18:24 Alarm to Dnipropetrovsk region. Consider that the alarm is still in:- Manganese and Marganetsky territorial community of Nikopol and Nikopol Territorial Community
item.description: 🟡 18:24 Alarm to Dnipropetrovsk region. Consider that the alarm is still in:- Manganese and Marganetsky territorial community of Nikopol and Nikopol Territorial Community#Dnepropetrovsk_. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
